title: Walajabad taluk
text:
Walajabad taluk is a <a href="Tehsils%20of%20India">taluk</a> in the <a href="Kanchipuram%20district">Kanchipuram district</a> of <a href="Tamil%20Nadu">Tamil Nadu</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. At the <a href="2011%20Census%20of%20India">2011 Census of India</a>, the taluk covered an area of with a population of 125,868. The headquarters of the taluk is the town of <a href="Walajabad">Walajabad</a>.
Villages in Walajabad taluk.
Walajabad taluk contains 80 villages, including:
